statistic.name: Normal_data
statistic.description: This program creates a dataset based on the normal curve
statistic.rcode: # Normalized data set for testing EIRnorm <- function(var_1,var_2,var_3) {var_2+var_3*scale(rnorm(var_1))} x <- EIRnorm(1000,100,15) library(pastecs) stat.desc(x) # Create a data frame df <- data.frame
